channel.title: Jihun Lee | Computer System Architecture Lab

item.title: HyMM: A Hybrid Sparse-Dense Matrix Multiplication Accelerator for GCNs
Jihun presented at DATE 2025
item.description: Jihun presented his research work regarding a hybrid GNN accelerator architecture at the Design, Automation and Test in Europe Conference 2025 (DATE 2025). DATE is one of top-tier conferences on design automation, hardware design and architecture. Good job, Jihun!

item.title: CSArch Lab members attended CSC 2025
item.description: CSArch Lab members attended KIISE Computer System Society Conference 2025 (CSC 2025) held in Pyeongchang, Gangwon-do. Our lab members had a great time as the great researchers on computer system research fields presented keynotes and their research work during the conference. Prof. Gunjae Koo served as a program chair for CSC 2025.

item.title: One paper accepted to DATE 2025
item.description: One papers was accepted to the Design, Automation and Test in Europe Conference (DATE) 2025. Our paper proposes HyMM, an efficient sparse-dense matrix multiplication accelerator architecture for GCNs. HyMM implements a hybrid sparse-dense matrix multiplication dataflow to exploit the data locality observed in graph structures in GCNs.

item.title: Chanhun, Jihun, Sanghyeon, and Seongpil have joined CSArch Lab
item.description: Chanhun, Jihun, Sanghyeon, and Seongpil have joined CSArch Lab since the Spring semester 2024. We hope they will enjoy adventures in computer architecture research. Welcome!!
